entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Secure by default attribute and analyzers #45658
  • `dotnet watch` prints `No hot reload changes to apply` when `<AdditionalFiles>` is used in .csproj #45656

Closed

  • Github action fails trying to load dotnet-runtime-wasm-linux #45519

PullRequests

Merged

  • Look up the target OS for crossgen2 using the full target RID #45566
    untriaged, Area-ReadyToRun
  • dotnetcli.azureedge.net -> builds.dotnet.microsoft.com #45620
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add exit code to the compatibility tool. #45642
    untriaged, Area-ApiCompat

Updated

  • Commands for generating shell completion scripts + statically-generated bash script #42416
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Area-CLI, cli-ux
  • [DO NOT MERGE} Skip a few tests on osx #45419
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, DO NOT MERGE
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.2xx' => 'main' #45587
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update Source-Build License Scan Baselines and Exclusions #45618
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merge branch 'release/9.0.2xx' => 'main' #45614
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'release/9.0.2xx' #45636
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
